comments:
After doing some work with web services, I noticed the following NPE written to
the command shell from which I had started eclipse.  Not sure what I did to
cause it -- it may have been deleting all the projects in my workspace after I
was done.

This is fixed for the 0815 M8 WTP build.

This has a functional verification test to ensure quality

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old and it is assumed really fixed and no longer useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
